short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a button on twitter home that shows media only tweets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Credit goes to Greasy Fork user Cro, from whom I referenced the script. Modified to be an extension that has an extra button below the tweet button that is reactive to the theme you have.

If you do not see the new button, please refresh the page.
